venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Chuck's STeakhouse in Auburn hosts trivia night every Thursday, beginning at 7p.m. However, my co-organizer Paula, has volunteered to meet people at 6:30 p.m. Trivia is held in the lounge section of the restaurant. Trivia teams are comprised of six people each. An emcee reads the question, and the team bids a certain number of points per question, based on confidence level. The team with the most points, wins a prize, usually a gift certificate to Chuck's.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign, and I will give out my cell# closer to the event.
item.name: Trivia at chuck's in Auburn
